description: The 89th Prime Minister of Japan, the main protagonist of the story. Armed with a natural talent for mahjong, passed down from his grandfather Koizumi Matajiro, Jun`ichirou defends Japanese interests and integrity against the heads of the world`s superpowers, even after his retirement from politics. Signature skills include "Goumoupai" (轟盲牌, scraping tiles with a tight grip to make white tiles), and "Rising Sun" (Thirteen orphans).
name: Koizumi Jun`ichirou
